full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 240 of 262 1951
LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross
1 Q. And to you, she appeared to be someone who took care of his properties; right?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. She managed the various properties?
4 A. Yes.
5 Q. She managed the property managers who were on site at the properties?
6 A. Correct.
7 Q. She hired staff for these residences?
8 A. Yes.
9 Q. She would oversee the repairs and renovations for these residences, things like that?
10 A. Yes.
11 Q. And she was also responsible for purchases, you said; right?
12 A. Yes.
13 Q. So she would purchase items for the house, like furniture items, things like that?
14 A. Yes.
15 Q. She would do the same for the planes, too; right?
16 A. Yes.
17 Q. She decorated the residences and the planes?
18 A. Yes.
19 Q. This was a pretty big job; right?
20 A. Very big.
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00013518

1 Q. And to you, she appeared to be someone who took care of his properties; right?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. She managed the various properties?
4 A. Yes.
5 Q. She managed the property managers who were on site at the properties?

11 Q. And she was also responsible for purchases, you said; right?

13 Q. So she would purchase items for the house, like furniture items, things like that?

15 Q. She would do the same for the planes, too; right?

17 Q. She decorated the residences and the planes?
18 A. Yes.
19 Q. This was a pretty big job; right?
20 A. Very big.
